text: (ai rasool) hamane tumhaare paas (bhee) to isee tarah vahee bhejee jis tarah nooh aur usake baad vaale paigambaron par bhejee thee aur jis tarah ibaraaheem aur ismail aur isahaaq aur yaaqoob aur aulaade yaaqoob va eesa va ayyoob va yunus va haaroon va sulemaan ke paas vahee bhejee thee aur hamane daood ko zuboor ata kee
